events.title: Pushkar Camel Fair
events.description: Cultural fair with livestock trading, markets & performances; excellent for photography and Rajasthani handicrafts.

events.title: Jaipur Literature Festival
events.description: Major literary festival — talks, panels and cultural shows. Many free sessions; check programme & tickets.

events.title: Diwali season markets
events.description: City-wide pop-ups, crafts and sweets — lively seasonal shopping to plan around Diwali.

markets.title: Dilli Haat (New Delhi)
markets.description: Curated crafts & food stalls from across India — ideal for safe handicraft buying.

markets.title: Chandni Chowk
markets.description: Historic market lanes for spices, fabrics and street food — expect crowds and bargaining.

markets.title: Johari Bazaar (Jaipur)
markets.description: Known for gemstones and traditional jewellery — buy high-value items only from reputable shops.

tips: Bargain politely; start lower and work up.
For spices/food, check customs rules before buying to bring home.
For gems, ask for hallmarks and receipts from trusted sellers.
